embed.title: Add your location to your profile!
embed.description:
Use these roles to add your general location to your profile! You can add multiple locations if it makes sense.

Please leave us a message in {} if you don't see a location that fits for you.
embed.footer:
React to the emoji below to add/remove the corresponding location.
If you already have the role but your react hasn't been added yet, add then remove the reaction to remove the role!
